get.description: Return all Costs for a CostReport.

parameters.name: cost_report_token
parameters.description: The CostReport token.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: First date you would like to filter costs from. ISO 8601 formatted.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Last date you would like to filter costs to. ISO 8601 formatted.

parameters.name: groupings
parameters.description: Group the results by specific field(s). Defaults to provider, service, account_id. Valid groupings: account_id, billing_account_id, charge_type, cost_category, cost_subcategory, provider, region, resource_id, service, tagged, tag:<tag_value>. If providing multiple groupings, join as comma separated values: groupings=provider,service,region

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Whether to order costs by date in an ascending or descending manner.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The amount of results to return. The maximum is 1000.

put.description: Updates the values for an existing BusinessMetric from a CSV file.

parameters.name: csv

get.description: Return available Products for a Service. For example, with a Provider of AWS and a Service of EC2, Products will be a list of all EC2 Instances. By default, this endpoint returns all Products across all Services and Providers but has optional query parameters for filtering listed below.

parameters.name: provider_id
parameters.description: Query by Provider to list all Products across all Services for a Provider. e.g. aws

parameters.name: service_id
parameters.description: Query by Service to list all Products for a specific provider service. e.g. aws-ec2

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Query by name of the Product to see a list of products which match that name. e.g. m5a.16xlarge

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The amount of results to return. The maximum is 1000

get.description: This is a health check endpoint that can be used to determine Vantage API healthiness. It will return 200 if everything is running smoothly.

200.description: This is a health check endpoint that can be used to determine Vantage API healthiness. It will return 200 if everything is running smoothly.

parent_folder_token.description: The token of the parent Folder.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens of the SavedFilters to apply to any Cost Report contained within the Folder.

workspace_token.description: The token of the Workspace to add the Folder to. Ignored if 'parent_folder_token' is set. Required if the API token is associated with multiple Workspaces.

parent_folder_token.description: The token for the parent Folder, if any.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens for the SavedFilters assigned to the Folder.

created_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the Folder was created. ISO 8601 Formatted.

updated_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the Folder was last updated at. ISO 8601 Formatted.

workspace_token.description: The token for the Workspace the Folder is a part of.

parent_folder_token.description: The token of the parent Folder.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens of the SavedFilters to apply to any Cost Report contained within the Folder.

workspace_token.description: The Workspace to associate the SavedFilter with. Required if the API token is associated with multiple Workspaces.

filter.description: The filter query language to apply to the SavedFilter, which subsequently gets applied to a CostReport. Additional documentation available at https://docs.vantage.sh/vql.

cost_report_tokens.description: The tokens for any CostReports the SavedFilter is applied to.

filter.description: The SavedFilter's filter, applied to any relevant CostReports. Additional documentation available at https://docs.vantage.sh/vql.

created_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the report was created. ISO 8601 Formatted.

created_by.description: The User who created the SavedFilter.

workspace_token.description: The token for the Workspace the SavedFilter is a part of.

filter.description: The filter query language to apply to the SavedFilter, which subsequently gets applied to a CostReport. Additional documentation available at https://docs.vantage.sh/vql.

workspace_token.description: The token of the Workspace to add the Cost Report to. Ignored if 'folder_token' is set. Required if the API token is associated with multiple Workspaces.

groupings.description: Grouping values for aggregating costs on the report. Valid groupings: account_id, billing_account_id, charge_type, cost_category, cost_subcategory, provider, region, resource_id, service, tagged, tag:<tag_value>. If providing multiple groupings, join as comma separated values: groupings=provider,service,region

filter.description: The filter query language to apply to the CostReport. Additional documentation available at https://docs.vantage.sh/vql.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens of the SavedFilters to apply to the CostReport.

business_metric_token.description: The token of the BusinessMetric to attach to the CostReport.

unit_scale.description: Determines the scale of the BusinessMetric's values within the CostReport.

folder_token.description: The token of the Folder to add the CostReport to. Determines the Workspace the report is assigned to.

track_unallocated.description: Track Unallocated Costs which are not assigned to any of the created Segments.

include_refunds.description: Reports created under this Segment will include refunds.

amortize.description: Reports created under this Segment will amortize.

widget_tokens.description: The tokens of the widgets to add to the Dashboard. Currently only supports CostReport tokens.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens of the Saved Filters used in the Dashboard.

date_bin.description: Determines how to group costs in the Dashboard.

date_interval.description: Determines the date range in the Dashboard. Incompatible with 'start_date' and 'end_date' parameters.

start_date.description: The start date for the date range for costs in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Incompatible with 'date_interval' parameter.

end_date.description: The end date for the date range for costs in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Incompatible with 'date_interval' parameter.

workspace_token.description: The token of the Workspace to add the Dashboard to. Required if the API token is associated with multiple Workspaces.

widget_tokens.description: The tokens of the widgets displayed in the Dashboard. Currently only supports CostReport tokens.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens of the Saved Filters used in the Dashboard.

date_bin.description: Determines how to group costs in the Dashboard.

date_interval.description: Determines the date range in the Dashboard. Guaranteed to be set to 'custom' if 'start_date' and 'end_date' are set.

start_date.description: The start date for the date range for CostReports in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Overwrites 'date_interval' if set.

end_date.description: The end date for the date range for CostReports in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Overwrites 'date_interval' if set.

created_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the Dashboard was created. ISO 8601 Formatted.

updated_at.description: The date and time, in UTC, the Dashboard was created. ISO 8601 Formatted.

workspace_token.description: The token for the Workspace the Dashboard is a part of.

widget_tokens.description: The tokens of the widgets to add to the Dashboard. Currently only supports CostReport tokens.

saved_filter_tokens.description: The tokens of the Saved Filters used in the Dashboard.

date_bin.description: Determines how to group costs in the Dashboard.

date_interval.description: Determines the date range in the Dashboard. Incompatible with 'start_date' and 'end_date' parameters.

start_date.description: The start date for the date range for costs in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Incompatible with 'date_interval' parameter.

end_date.description: The end date for the date range for costs in the Dashboard. ISO 8601 Formatted. Incompatible with 'date_interval' parameter.

total_cost.description: The sum of all costs for the CostReport for the requested period, rounded to 2 decimal places, alongside the ISO 4217 currency code.

accrued_at.description: The date the cost was accrued. ISO 8601 Formatted.

provider.description: The cost provider which incurred the cost.

billing_account_id.description: The cost provider's billing account id that incurred the cost.

account_id.description: The cost provider's account id that incurred the cost.

service.description: The service which incurred the cost.

region.description: The region which incurred the cost.

resource_id.description: The resource id which incurred the cost.

tag.description:
The tag attached to the cost that was incurred.
DEPRECATED: does not support multiple tags.

tags.description: The tag pairs attached to the cost that was incurred.

workspace_tokens.description: The Workspace tokens to associate to the Team.

user_tokens.description: The User tokens to associate to the Team.

user_emails.description: The User emails to associate to the Team.

role.description: The role to assign to the provided Users. Defaults to 'editor' which has editor permissions.

access.description: The access level you want to grant. Defaults to 'allowed'.

access.description: Allowed or denied access to resource.

change.description: The type of change the ReportNotification is tracking. Possible values: percentage, dollars.

category.description: The category of the cloud product

name.description: The common name of the product.

service_id.description: A unique slug for the service the product belongs to.

details.description: An object of metadata about the product.

unit.description: The unit in which the amount is billed.

region.description: The region the price is specific to.

rate_type.description: The part of the product the price applies to. (compute, transfer, etc..)

amount.description: The amount of money this specific product price costs.

default.description: Indicates whether the ResourceReport is the default report.

segment_token.description: The token for the Segment the ResourceReport is a part of.
